name: Identifying Covert Narcissism
description: Recognizing the more subtle and passive-aggressive traits of covert narcissists.

cards.title: Recognizing Victimhood as a Manipulation Tool
cards.description: Understanding how covert narcissists weaponize victim status.
bulletpoints: They often exaggerate hardships to justify entitled behavior.
Subtle guilt-tripping and emotional manipulation are common tactics.
Watch for patterns of blaming others while avoiding accountability.
cards.summaryText: See how they inflate suffering to excuse bad behavior, detect the quiet guilt trips that steer you into compliance, and note the endless blame-shifting that dodges all accountability.

cards.title: Detecting Passive-Aggressive Sabotage
cards.description: Identifying subtle attacks and psychological undermining.
bulletpoints: Covert narcissists use sarcasm, backhanded compliments, and silent treatment.
They often create confusion by presenting mixed signals and emotional inconsistency.
Watch for patterns of subtle undermining and indirect criticism.
cards.summaryText: Catch the snark, fake-praise, and freeze-outs that hurt without leaving marks, recognize the constant mixed messages that scramble your thinking, and track the quiet digs that erode confidence over time.

cards.title: The Energy Drain Trap
cards.description: How covert narcissists drain emotional and mental energy over time.
bulletpoints: They create drama and emotional dependency to stay in control.
Conversations feel exhausting rather than uplifting.
They subtly erode confidence through constant micro-manipulations.
cards.summaryText: Spot the manufactured drama and dependency hooks that keep you tethered, notice when every interaction leaves you drained instead of lifted, and see the death-by-a-thousand-cuts erosion of your self-belief.
